originalText.text: Rosie is incredible. Her work is impeccable. Not only that she is very knowledgeable about aesthetics and always takes the time to talk with her clients to make sure you know exactly what you need and why. She is also very warm and kind. 10/10 recommend Rosie for all your injectable needs. She’s simply the best

She is also very warm and kind. 10/10 recommend Rosie for all your injectable needs. She’s simply the best

originalText.text: Rosie is God sent! She always delivers the best possible care and treatments, I’ve never left her office disappointed. I’ve had PRP for hair restoration, botox, cheek and lip filler and B-12 injections done with her. She is professional, clean and has great bedside manner. She always listens and genuinely cares about making you look and feel your absolute best. I will be going to her for all my beauty needs indefinitely and I would highly recommend her.

She always listens and genuinely cares about making you look and feel your absolute best. I will be going to her for all my beauty needs indefinitely and I would highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Rosie is great!  She is extremely professional and listened to all of my concerns before she began.  Knowing I wasn’t good with needles, Rosie talked me through the whole process and made it a very calming experience.  I couldn’t be happier with the results every time I go see her.

text.text: Rosie is great!  She is extremely professional and listened to all of my concerns before she began.  Knowing I wasn’t good with needles, Rosie talked me through the whole process and made it a very calming experience.  I couldn’t be happier with the results every time I go see her.

originalText.text: I can say with confidence Rosie is one of the most knowledgeable & skilled injectors I've ever been to. I've gotten injections from plastic surgeons, med spas, & nurses who only work in general medicine. But I see why R.N.s w/ reconstructive surgical experience are the best injectors in every way possible. I really can't say enough positive things about my experiences being treated by Rosie. Regarding her business practices in general she's very fair & upfront w/ pricing and what's needed to achieve desired result (no surprise fees or charges). Rosie's flat out honest about what results you can expect & has an excellent eye for what's best aesthetically pleasing for your unique face shape/structure. I love her no nonsense approach. She skips thru any B.S. and is all about amazing results & passion for her work. If you're on a budget (who's not?) Rosie makes excellent recommendations for a plan going forward to maintain results & stay within my budget (i.e. areas I can get away with only treating 2x a year vs every 3 months). Overall I've been very impressed with Rosie's  professionalism, skills, & knowledge. I love her confidence as instead of upselling or pushing more treatments, Rosie seems to make her work & results speak for themselves. Long, long story short - I walked into Rosie's office w/ the forehead of a Shar Pei. One week later I have a forehand as smooth as an 18 y/o....AND completely natural looking! Rosie made me feel beautiful again.

originalText.text: Rosie is the best. She listens to what you want and gives the best, most thoughtful recommendations for what suite your needs. She’s also incredibly gentle with injections. My face has never looked better, all my colleagues say I look refreshed but really it was just Rosie’s magic!
